title: General Use
description: The items in this category are considered useful for all races and classes.
However, some classes will rely more heavily on the items in this category than
others.

items.name: Health Potion
description: Restores 5 HP to target entity

items.name: Greater Health Potion
description: Restores 10 HP to target entity

items.name: Mana Potion
description: Restores 5 MP to target entity

items.name: Greater Mana Potion
description: Restores 10 MP to target entity

items.name: Exploding Potion
description: Deals 3 fire damage to target entity

items.name: Panancea
description: Removes all status conditions (except death) from target entity

items.name: Angel Feather
description: Removes death and restores 5 HP to target entity

items.name: Grenade
description: Deals 5HP fire damage to target entity up to 3 squares away.

items.name: Smoke Ball
description: -1 to all attack rolls made against target entity

items.name: Torch
description: Used to light up dark areas. Must be lit to use.

items.name: Flint
description: Gives +1 to roll when starting a fire or lighting a torch.

items.name: Arrow
description: Ammo for bows and longbows.
notes: Can be retrieved after firing.

items.name: Crossbow Bolt
description: Ammo for crossows.
notes: Can be retrieved after firing.

items.name: Iron Pellet
description: Ammo for pistols and rifles.

title: Weapons
description: As the name suggests, these are items which are primarily meant for combat and
include both melee and ranged weapons. Pay close attention to the notes each of
these items list out however, as picking the wrong weapon could put your
character at a serious disadvantage. Additionally, heavier weapons require higher
stats to use and also give a heavy bonus to speed (speed cannot drop below 0)
making it harder to react during battle.

items.name: Kunai
description: A small bladed weapon which can be wielded like a knife or thrown.
notes: If dual wielding add +1 to damage.
Cannot use items in battle while dual wielding.
Range is only 3 if being thrown, if not throwing, range is 1
Once thrown, must be retrieved before using again.

items.name: Knife
description: A favorite of rogues and assassins. Easy to use and easily concealed.
notes: If dual wielding add +1 to damage.
Cannot use items in battle while dual wielding.

items.name: Dagger
description: A short bladed weapon which favors speed over power.
notes: If dual wielding add +1 to damage
Cannot use items in battle while dual wielding.

items.name: Sword
description: The gold star standard used by knights and soldiers everywhere.
notes: If dual weilding add +1 to damage
Cannot use items in battle while dual wielding.

items.name: Two-Handed Sword
description: A large bladed weapon which uses weight vs. sharpness to tear through
armor and flesh.
notes: Cannot be dual weilded.

items.name: Axe
description: A large bladed weapon which can be used either for battle or for
chopping wood.
notes: Cannot be dual weilded

items.name: Hatchet
description: A small hand-held size axe which can be dual wielded or thrown.
notes: If dual wielding add +1 to damage.
Cannot use items in battle while dual wielding.
Range is only 3 if being thrown, if not throwing, range is 1
Once thrown, must be retrieved before using again.

items.name: Mace
description: Great for smashing things, a favorite of goblins and kobolds.
notes: Cannot be dual weilded.

items.name: Staff
description: A large piece of wood often carried by wizards and monks.
notes: Cannot be dual weilded.

items.name: Spear
description: Standard pointed weapon used for battle and can also be used for
fishing or hunting.
notes: Cannot be dual wielded

items.name: Lance
description: Generally used from atop a horse, pegasus
or wyvern. It's large size generally does not make it a good candidate
for fighting on the ground.
notes: Cannot be dual wielded

items.name: Bow
description: Standard bow used by archers everywhere.
notes: Cannot be dual wielded.

items.name: Long-bow
description: An enormous bow which requires an immense amount of skill to use.
notes: Cannot be dual wielded

items.name: Crossbow
description: An extremely powerful bow which takes an enormous amount of strength
to use.
notes: Cannot be dual wielded
Do not add dexterity to this weapon when calculating damage.

items.name: Blunderbuss pistol
description: A small high power pistol favored by brigands and pirates.
notes: If dual wielding add +1 to damage
Cannot use items in battle while dual wielding.

items.name: Musket
description: A muzzle loaded long gun which can be used for battle or hunting
game.
notes: Cannot be dual wielded

items.name: Trebuchet
description: A large siege weapon capable of firing debris long distances.
notes: This weapon cannot be moved from it's location on the map
This weapon can only be fired while there is ammo in it's ammo box
Must take 1 turn to load and 1 turn to fire
This weapon must be mounted/unmounted

items.name: Catapult
description: A large siege weapon capable of firing debris long distances.
notes: This weapon cannot be moved from it's location on the map
This weapon can only be fired while there is ammo in it's ammo box
Must take 1 turn to load and 1 turn to fire
This weapon must be mounted/unmounted

items.name: Cannon
description: A heavy ranged weapon capable of firing large balls of metal
long distances.
notes: This weapon cannot be moved from it's location on the map
This weapon can only be fired while there is ammo in it's ammo box
Must take 1 turn to load and 1 turn to fire
This weapon must be mounted/unmounted

items.name: Drill Harpoon
description: A gigantic bow which can only be fired once. A siege weapon
generally used to fight large monsters or invading armies.
notes: This weapon cannot be moved from it's location on the map
This weapon can only be fired once
This weapon must be mounted/unmounted

items.name: Padded Gloves
description: A set of gloves designed to protect the hands and knuckles
while fighting.
notes: This weapon cannot be dual wielded.

items.name: Brass Knuckles
description: A set of joined metal rings worn during fights. Not
acceptable to use during tournaments.
notes: This weapon cannot be dual wielded.

title: Armor & Clothing
description: Armor provides a way for characters to protect themselves from damage.
Entities can equip only a single armor set at a single time and can also
equip a shield for a bit of extra protection if they choose. Like weapons
the heavier pieces of armor require a higher amount of strength to use and
also give a heavy bonus to speed (speed cannot drop below 0) making it harder
to react during battle.

items.name: Robe
description: A heavy robe made out of woven linen. Offers very little protection
but is fairly lightweight making it a favorite of mages.

items.name: Leather Armor
description: Armor made from tanned leather hides, is reasonably lightweight and
provides a small amount of protection.

items.name: Lacquered Armor
description: Lightweight armor made from lacquered slats of wood and allowing for fast
and fluid movement.

items.name: Studded Armor
description: Leather armor with metal studs embedded into it for added protection

items.name: Chainmail Armor
description: Armor made from interwoven links of metal. Provides decent protection
And is fairly lightweight. A favorite of battle mages.

items.name: Bone Armor
description: Armor made from stitched together animal bones and hide. Fairly strong but
also a bit heavy

items.name: Platemail Armor
description: Armor made from solid plates of metal. Provides good protection but is
extremely heavy

items.name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: Armor made from dragon hides and scales and illegal to buy or sell in shops.
However, some articles have turned up in ancient ruins and tombs.
notes: While this is equipped, ice damage taken is doubled, Fire damage taken is halved

items.name: Dragon Bone Armor
description: Armor made from dragon bones stitched together with dragon hides. Like dragon
scale armor, this is illegal to buy or sell in shops; however suits of this are
still traded on the black market.
notes: While this is equipped, ice damage taken is doubled, Fire damage taken is halved

items.name: Shield
description: Useful for blocking physical attacks. Can be made out of metal or wood.
notes: This cannot be used if dual wielding
Cannot use items during battle while this is equipped

items.name: Dragon Scale Shield
description: A durable shield made of dragon hide and scales and illegal to buy or
sell in shops. However, some articles have turned up in ancient ruins
and tombs.
notes: This cannot be used if dual wielding
Cannot use items during battle while this is equipped
While this is equipped, ice damage taken is doubled, Fire damage taken is halved

items.name: Dragon Bone Shield
description: A durable shield made from dragon bones stitched together with dragon
hides and illegal to buy or sell in shops. However, some articles have
turned up in ancient ruins and tombs.
notes: This cannot be used if dual wielding
Cannot use items during battle while this is equipped
While this is equipped, ice damage taken is doubled, Fire damage taken is halved

items.name: Mithrill Armor
description: Armor made from interwoven threads of mithrill. Extremely lightweight and
provides some weak magic protection. This is a favorite of battle mages.
However it is a bit pricey.

items.name: Mithrill Shield
description: A shield made from a solid plate of mithrill. Fairly lightweight and provides.
a small amount of magical protection as well.
notes: This cannot be used if dual wielding
Cannot use items during battle while this is equipped

title: Specialized
description: The items in this category are items which are geared towards specific class use such
as spellbooks or crafting tools.

items.name: Lockpick
description: Required to use the lockpicking skill

items.name: Novice Instrument
description: Required to cast spells out of the Music school.
notes: Holds 2 spells (Music spells only)
Can be pretty much any instrument: Lute, Drum, Fife, etc.

items.name: Instrument
description: Required to cast spells out of the Music school.
notes: Holds 3 spells (Music spells only)
Can be pretty much any instrument: Lute, Drum, Fife, etc.

items.name: Bardic Instrument
description: Required to cast spells out of the Music school.
notes: Holds 4 spells (Music spells only)
Can be pretty much any instrument: Lute, Drum, Fife, etc.

items.name: Novice Spellbook
description: Required to cast spells.
notes: -1 to MP cost for spells
Holds 2 spells (Light, Arcane, Dark, and Summoning magic only)
Weapon cannot be equipped while using this

items.name: Spellbook
description: Required to cast spells.
notes: -1 to MP cost for spells
Holds 3 spells (Light, Arcane, Dark, and Summoning magic only)
Weapon cannot be equipped while using this

items.name: Arcane Spellbook
description: Required to cast spells.
notes: -2 to MP cost for spells
Holds 4 spells (Light, Arcane, Dark, and Summoning magic only)
Weapon cannot be equipped while using this

items.name: Novice Gauntlet
description: Required to cast spells.
notes: Holds 2 spells (Anything but Music)

items.name: Gauntlet
description: Required to cast spells.
notes: Holds 3 spells (Anything but Music)

items.name: Elder Gauntlet
description: Required to cast spells.
notes: Holds 4 spells (Anything but Music)

items.name: Chemistry Set
description: Required to use alchemy

items.name: Saw
description: Required to use carpentry.

items.name: Mixing Bowl
description: Required to use cooking.

items.name: Etching Tool
description: Required to use enchanting.

items.name: Pickaxe
description: Required to use mining.

items.name: Pickaxe
description: Required to use mining.

items.name: Blacksmith's Hammer
description: Required to use blacksmithing.

items.name: Toolbox
description: Required to use tinkering.
